decks.notes: The focus of this deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining a fast and aggressive tempo. By utilizing cards like Thoughtseize, Daze, and Force of Will, the deck aims to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Additionally, cards like Fatal Push and Brazen Borrower help deal with threats on the board. The deck also includes card draw spells like Ponder and Brainstorm to ensure consistency in drawing the necessary cards. Overall, the deck aims to pressure the opponent early on and maintain control throughout the game.

The main strategy of this UR Aggro deck is to control the board with disruptive spells like Force of Will and Daze while applying pressure with efficient creatures like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Delver of Secrets. The deck also leverages powerful card selection tools like Mishra's Bauble and Ponder to set up explosive plays. Wasteland is used to disrupt the opponent's mana base, and Lightning Bolt provides reach to finish off opponents. The deck aims to quickly establish a strong board presence and maintain tempo throughout the game.

The deck aims to win the game by milling the opponent's entire library in one turn using a combination of cards like Undercity Informer and Balustrade Spy. By utilizing powerful mana acceleration cards like Lotus Petal and Dark Ritual, the deck can quickly deploy its combo pieces and win the game before the opponent has a chance to react. The deck also includes cards like Pact of Negation to protect its combo and disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Cabal Therapy.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Archon of Cruelty, then bringing them back onto the battlefield with cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead. It utilizes control elements like Daze, Thoughtseize, and Force of Will to protect the combo pieces and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Additionally, the deck includes card advantage through cards like Brainstorm and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student, ensuring a consistent stream of threats to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory through powerful reanimation strategies.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize Cloudpost ramping to quickly generate mana in order to play powerful spells and abilities that can disrupt the opponent's strategy and overwhelm them with a combination of threats and control elements. The deck includes cards that allow for quick and efficient mana generation, as well as a variety of powerful creatures and spells that can quickly turn the tide of the game in the player's favor. Overall, the deck aims to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent through a combination of ramp, disruption, and powerful threats.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly assemble the Coveted Jewel combo, using cards like Transmute Artifact, Copy Artifact, and Show and Tell to quickly find and play the jewel. Additionally, cards like Phyrexian Metamorph and Grim Monolith help ramp up mana to play powerful cards like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and The One Ring. With the deck's fast mana resources like Ancient Tomb and City of Traitors, it aims to overwhelm opponents with a powerful board state and win through a combination of card advantage and overwhelming threats.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Unmask, then bring them back into play with spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead. These big creatures, such as Griselbrand and Archon of Cruelty, have game-changing abilities that can swing the match in your favor. By carefully managing resources like Dark Ritual and Lotus Petal, this combo-reanimator deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with massive threats early in the game, making it difficult for them to recover and win.

The deck focuses on using Reanimate and Entomb to power out big threats like Murktide Regent, Atraxa, Grand Unifier, and Archon of Cruelty early in the game. It also utilizes disruption like Thoughtseize and Daze to control the opponent's hand and tempo. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student helps with card selection and filtering, while Brainstorm and Ponder provide additional card draw. The deck also includes powerful counterspells like Force of Will and Force of Negation to protect its game plan. With a mix of threats and disruption, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent before they can establish their own game plan.

This deck aims to quickly dump its entire library into the graveyard and win the game with Thassa's Oracle or Boggart Trawler. It uses cards like Dark Ritual, Simian Spirit Guide, and Lotus Petal to generate fast mana, while also utilizing cards like Undercity Informer and Balustrade Spy to mill the library. The combo is protected with Pact of Negation and disruption is provided by cards like Thoughtseize and Cabal Therapy. The deck is high-risk, high-reward, with the potential to win the game on the first turn.

Using a combination of hand disruption spells and aggressive creatures to apply pressure early in the game, while utilizing powerful supporting cards like Goblin Bombardment and Wasteland to control the board. The deck focuses on creating a fast and disruptive game plan, with the potential to overwhelm the opponent quickly with a combination of removal, creature buffs, and evasive threats. The strategy involves disrupting the opponent's game plan while steadily building up a threatening board presence to secure victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing artifacts to quickly generate mana and disrupt opponent's strategies. By combining aggressive artifact creatures with powerful spells like Force of Will, it aims to overwhelm the opponent and control the game. The inclusion of Urza's Saga and Emry, Lurker of the Loch allows for efficient recursion and card advantage, while cards like Tormod's Crypt provide graveyard hate. The deck's strategy revolves around creating a fast-paced, aggressive gameplay that aims to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent in Legacy 1 vs 1 matches.

The main concept of this Combo - Painter Legacy deck is to assemble the Painter's Servant and Grindstone combo to mill your opponent's entire deck in one turn. The deck utilizes various artifact ramp cards like Grim Monolith and Lotus Petal to quickly get the combo pieces onto the battlefield. Karn, the Great Creator and Tezzeret, Cruel Captain provide additional support and utility for the deck. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Nihil Spellbomb and Pithing Needle while efficiently executing its own win condition.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly assemble the combo pieces needed to win the game in a single explosive turn. By utilizing fast mana sources, tutors, and free spells, the deck aims to mill itself out and then win the game by using Thassa's Oracle to win the game instantly. The deck has little to no interaction with the opponent's board, focusing solely on executing its own game plan efficiently and effectively. With the right draws and sequencing, this deck can win out of nowhere, catching opponents off guard and securing victory.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively disrupt the opponent's game plan while using tempo plays to maintain control of the battlefield. By using cards like Fatal Push, Thoughtseize, and Force of Will to disrupt the opponent's strategy, while creatures like Brazen Borrower and Nethergoyf apply pressure on the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Brainstorm to provide card advantage and selection. With a mix of disruption, tempo plays, and efficient threats, this deck aims to outmaneuver the opponent and secure victory.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize control elements such as counterspells, removal spells, and card draw to disrupt opponent's game plan while generating card advantage with cards like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Snapcaster Mage. The deck aims to control the board with cards like Swords to Plowshares and Dress Down, as well as locking down non-basic lands with Back to Basics. The inclusion of cards like Flame of Anor and Thundertrap Trainer provide win conditions while the mana base is designed to ensure consistent access to all colors of mana needed for the deck's spells.

The main idea behind this deck is to quickly and aggressively put pressure on the opponent using cheap and efficient creatures like Delver of Secrets and Dragon's Rage Channeler. By combining aggressive creatures with disruptive spells like Lightning Bolt, Force of Will, and Daze, the deck aims to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan while still maintaining a fast clock. The mana base is designed to support the deck's aggressive game plan, with cards like Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's mana base and fetch lands to ensure consistent mana access.
